error.auth: Weather service API key or version incorrect
error.name: Specifica un nome univoco per questa istanza.

user.title: Impostazioni Generali
user.description: Se hai bisogno di aiuto con la configurazione, dai un'occhiata qui https://github.com/jeroenterheerdt/HASmartIrrigation

data.name: Nome univoco per questa istanza
data.use_weather_service: Use a weather service (Open Weather Map, Pirate Weather, or KNMI) for weather data or forecasting. Enable this option if you intent to use one of the supported weather services for at least part of the weather data, including forecasting. Disable this option if you want to use another source, such as your own weather station, exclusively. In this case, Smart Irrigation will not be able to use forecasts.

step1.title: Weather service API set up
step1.description: Se hai bisogno di aiuto con la configurazione, dai un'occhiata qui https://github.com/jeroenterheerdt/HASmartIrrigation

Enable this option if you intent to use one of the supported weather services for at least part of the weather data, including forecasting. Disable this option if you want to use another source, such as your own weather station, exclusively. In this case, Smart Irrigation will not be able to use forecasts.
